dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on immediate, actionable solutions using proven methods and clear steps.
Your FarTwin will explore innovative approaches and think outside the box to find unique solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Preference
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will follow established teachings, protocols, and methodologies for acquiring knowledge.
Your FarTwin will delve into new subjects through hands-on experimentation, trial-and-error, or guided discovery.

dimensions.label: Social Dynamics
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently assert their presence, opinions, and needs in group settings.
Your FarTwin will focus on building alliances, consensus, and mutual understanding with others.

dimensions.label: Content Preferences
dimensions.description: What type of content does your FarTwin tend to engage with?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek out factual, informative content that educates and expands their knowledge.
Your FarTwin will gravitate toward engaging stories, jokes, or experiences that spark amusement and enjoyment.

dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will weigh evidence, analyze data, and rely on objective criteria to arrive at a decision.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, emotions, and personal values to guide the decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage in a strong, assertive approach to resolving disputes, often emphasizing winning the argument.
Your FarTwin will focus on finding mutually beneficial solutions, compromising and collaborating to resolve conflicts.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin view the world and its complexities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will recognize interconnectedness, striving for a unified understanding of global challenges and opportunities.
Your FarTwin will prioritize local concerns, focusing on immediate needs and issues relevant to their immediate community or region.
